title: Playing with Fire
description: This is the campaign defined in the rulebook of the Iron Keep expansions, with a new custom boss

dungeons.introMessage: Your journey begins in the desolate Harvest Valley, amongst the poisonous pits and treacherous mines. Beware this charred quarry, for death awaits the unwary, even at this early stage.
Yet as you approach the blasted and damned walls of the Iron Keep, you may grow reluctant to leave, for the path ahead will only prove more dangerous.
You have reached the Brume Tower, your final location standing atop the bleakest wasteland imaginable. It is here that your last adversary, a figure of myth and legend, awaits
